# Summary {background-color="#2c3e50"}

## Key Takeaways

::: {.incremental}
- **Format**: Vector for plots (PDF/SVG), high-res raster for photos (PNG/TIFF)
- **Colors**: Avoid rainbow, use viridis/ColorBrewer, test for colorblindness
- **Sizing**: Set text sizes explicitly for final dimensions
- **Saving**: Use `ggsave()` with proper DPI and dimensions
- **Reproducibility**: Keep R scripts as source of truth
:::

## Resources

- ColorBrewer: [colorbrewer2.org](https://colorbrewer2.org)
- Colorblind simulator: [coblis.org](https://www.coblis.com)
- "Fundamentals of Data Visualization" by Claus Wilke
- ggplot2 documentation: [ggplot2.tidyverse.org](https://ggplot2.tidyverse.org)
